_sText:
OK... so.... i had a lot of fun playing on the first version of the map.... I decided to upgrade the original version with more fair arrangements of props... a vent for added strategy... and some doors at the halfway point for additional cover

now... the first version was created on July 1st and tested with friends that same night

the second version was created on July 2nd and tested that same night again...




FOR THE TESTERS ON THE NIGHT OF JULY 2ND AND THE DAY OF JULY 3RD

thank you for testing.... but.....
I've made some adjustments since the testing thus the "_final" at the end of the map name.. so YES you DO have to re-download it... even though you tested it....



TO INSTALL.... aww you should know how to install :P.... but if you don't...
unzip to your cstrike/maps folder... usually being....
C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\<USERNAME>\Counter - Strike Source\cstrike\maps



also... BEFORE YOU RATE AND POST COMMENTS... play this map... with at least 12 or more people.... or bots....
i made this map to focus of fast paced game play....

have fun
